articles.title: Sun Pharma Recalls Over 34,000 Bottles Of Generic Drug In US After It Fails Test - NDTV
articles.description: Drug major Sun Pharma is recalling over 34,000 bottles of a generic medication, used to treat high blood pressure, in the US market due to failed dissolution testing.
articles.content:
The company initiated the Class II nationwide recall (US) on January 13 this year.
